co2.text: Just looking at the last month, CO₂ levels may look erratic
When looking at the last couple years, you can see the seasonal rhythm of CO₂
CO₂ peaks in the spring after plants decay in the winter
CO₂ sinks in the fall when plant regrowth removes CO₂ from the air
When looking at many years, you can see average CO₂ levels are rising...
When looking at many years, you can see average CO₂ levels are rising and rising...
When looking at many years, you can see average CO₂ levels are rising and rising and rising...
